Html:
Hi mates,
I am new in Prism and I want to know you opinion about building modular database application.
We want to use SQL Server 2K8 as back end. 
Can anyone tell us problems, challenges, weakness or big-deals with PRISM when you build a "traditional" database application.

Regards

Hi,

There are several ways you can access SQL data from Silverlight/WPF. Though Prism does not provide any special infrastructure to do this, since it is more focused on the presentation layer.

Additionally, this topic was treated in other forum threads where you can find feedback from the community, so you could take a look at the following links:

  • Prism V2 Silverlight - Retrieve data
  • how to get the data from the sqlserver's table data in Silverlight using CAG  

Please let me know if this helps.

Fernando Antivero
http://blogs.southworks.net/fantivero
